title: Honest Food in Small Batches Experience
blurb: Quality and artisanality in everything we offer.
description: Honest to goodness, it is our commitment to quality and artisanality in everything we offer to you and your little ones. Comfortable classics don't need to be overprocessed, think in-house sourdough, fresh pasta, and bakes. As we continually gain inspiration from what’s grown around us, escape from the hustle and bustle to a space that feels like a haven rather than an interruption to the iconic gardens.

title: Singapore Botanic Gardens Visit for a Wholesome Day
blurb: Enjoy brunch, lunch, and a wholesome visit.
description: Make the most of your visit to the Singapore Botanic Gardens with a delightful experience that extends from brunch to lunch. Discover the charm of this iconic location, where good things truly come in small packages. Explore the lush greenery, serene landscapes, and diverse plant life that make the gardens a perfect destination for families and nature enthusiasts alike. Enjoy a relaxing day out with loved ones amidst the beauty of Singapore's natural heritage. Perfect for families looking for a relaxing day out.

title: Batch.sg Venue Information and Menu Overview
blurb: Explore our menu and venue offerings at Batch.sg.
description: Discover the diverse culinary offerings and venue details at Batch.sg. Our venue provides a family-friendly atmosphere suitable for various occasions. We offer a wide range of menu options to cater to different tastes and preferences. Whether you're planning a casual meal or a special event, Batch.sg provides a welcoming environment for families and individuals alike. Enjoy a delightful dining experience with us, where quality food and excellent service are our top priorities. We aim to create memorable moments for all our guests, ensuring a pleasant and satisfying visit every time. Our venue is designed to accommodate families with children, offering a comfortable and enjoyable setting for everyone.

title: Jacob Ballas Children’s Garden Playground
blurb: Explore nature at Singapore Botanic Gardens!
description: Jacob Ballas Children's Garden is designed to provide children with an understanding of plant life. It features various themed areas like a water play area, a suspension bridge, and treehouses. The garden aims to educate children about the importance of plants and the environment through interactive exhibits and play. It's a great place for families to spend time outdoors and learn about nature together. The garden is suitable for children of all ages, with activities and exhibits designed to engage and educate. The playground offers a safe and fun environment for kids to explore and play.
datetime_display: Monday: Closed (Except on Public Holiday) Tuesday to Friday: 9am to 6pm Saturday and Sunday: 8am to 6pm
full_address: 1H Cluny Rd, #01-K1, Singapore 259604 Jacob Ballas Children’s Garden Monday: Closed (Except on Public Holiday) Tuesday to Friday: 9am to 6pm (Last Order 5

title: Jacob Ballas Children's Garden at Botanic Gardens
blurb: A garden designed for kids to learn about nature.
description: The Jacob Ballas Children's Garden is a unique space where children can learn about plant life and ecosystems through exploration and play. It features various themed areas, including a water play area, a suspension bridge, and a maze. The garden aims to foster an appreciation for nature and the environment in young visitors. It is designed for children up to 14 years old and offers educational programs and activities. The garden provides a safe and engaging environment for children to connect with nature and learn about the importance of conservation. The garden also includes a sensory garden, where children can explore different textures and scents.

title: Small Batch Cafe: Family-Friendly Dining Experience
blurb: Halal-friendly cafe beside Jacob Ballas Children's Garden.
description: Small Batch cafe offers a family-friendly dining experience located beside the Jacob Ballas Children's Garden with free admission. The cafe is halal-friendly and wheelchair accessible, with easy access from the carpark to the cafe and restrooms. The space can be booked for events for up to 20-25 people. Note that pets are not allowed. Enjoy a relaxing meal after a fun day at the garden. The cafe provides a convenient and comfortable environment for families to dine together. The menu includes a variety of options suitable for both adults and children.
